Package org.lafayette.server.web.http

All stuff needed for HTTP.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constants
    Various HTPP constants.
    Typeable
    Implementors must tell which MediaType it produces.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MediaType
    Extends MediaType from WS Core.
    UriList
    Represents a set of URIs used for responses of type URI-list.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ForbiddenException
    Used to signal failed authorization (Status 403).
    UnauthorizedException
    Used to signal authorization required.

Package org.lafayette.server.web.http Description

All stuff needed for HTTP.
